description: After Nintendo recently filed a lawsuit against the Yuzu team, it was pretty much inevitable this was going to happen wasn't it.
title: Yuzu agrees to pay Nintendo $2.4 million and will entirely shut down

description: Sunshine along with Moonlight are popular ways to run your own game streaming system (as say an alternative to Steam Remote Play), and the latest Sunshine release sounds great for Linux gamers.
title: Sunshine game streaming v0.22.0 adds HDR on Linux, Wayland + NVIDIA improvements

description: Are you saving up for a particular game, or just want to know what sales events are coming up on Steam? Got you covered here, as Valve have now revealed all.
title: Valve reveals schedule of sales events for the rest of 2024

description: Wine is about to get just that little bit sweeter, with new code recently merged into the project that should work around a performance issue with Vulkan.
title: Wine pulls in code to eliminate a Vulkan performance issue for wow64

description: Starting 2024 off strong, Valve has seen Steam smash the all-time record once again for users actually online showing that weekends are a busy time for gamers.
title: Steam smashes its peak players online record to over 34 million

description: Another month down according to Statcounter at least, Linux on the desktop is doing better than ever. Take it with your usual little pinch of salt like any survey sampling though.
title: Linux on the desktop breaks 4% for the first time on Statcounter

description: Seems like once again we're seeing an Asia influx on Steam, as the February 2024 Steam Hardware & Software Survey showed a big +7.62% bump in Simplified Chinese.
title: Steam Survey for February 2024 shows a big bump in Simplified Chinese
